channel.title: Death emote when you die
channel.description: In my project insanity server, when you die their is not emote you just teleport. , can someone tell me where in files i can change this ? and what code i change it to for normal die emote.

item.title: Death emote when you die
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“Trebel, post:2, topic:437794”]if(respawnTimer == 7) {
respawnTimer = -6;
getPA().giveLife();
} else if(respawnTimer == 12) {
respawnTimer–;
startAnimation(0x900);
poisonDamage = -1;
} [/quote]where ? i add this

Read full topic

item.title: Death emote when you die
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

if(respawnTimer == 7) {
respawnTimer = -6;
getPA().giveLife();
} else if(respawnTimer == 12) {
respawnTimer–;
startAnimation(0x900);
poisonDamage = -1;
}

Read full topic
